mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.bingcheng_id AS "bingchengId", a.content AS "content", a.jilushijian AS "jilushijian", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_record_superiordocrecor( id, bingcheng_id, content, jilushijian, create_date, del_flag, remarks, update_date, create_by, update_by ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{bingchengId}, #{content}, #{jilushijian}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks}, #{updateDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE course_record_superiordocrecor SET bingcheng_id = #{bingchengId}, content = #{content}, jilushijian = #{jilushijian}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id} WHERE id = #{id}
